title: Immortality and Cloning - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/3/18
itunes:title: Immortality and Cloning - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/3/18
description:
George Noory and author Stanley Bing debate the future use of technology and cloning as a way to improve human life and even implant a human soul into a new body to give it immortality.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
